summary: As cyber threats become more prevalent, so do threats to NASA's spacecraft—like the Orion Multi-Purpose Crew Vehicle. A cyberattack could lead to losing critical data, or possibly losing control of the spacecraft. NASA issued a guide on space security in 2023 that includes principles and practices to help spacecraft development programs with cybersecurity. For example, one principle states a space system should protect against unauthorized...
title: NASA Cybersecurity: Plan Needed to Update Spacecraft Acquisition Policies and Standards
